code: import axios from'axios';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import API_BASE_URL from'../config.js';const useEventPredictionService=()=>{const{token}=useAuth();const savePredictions=async(eventId,predictions)=>{if(!token){throw new Error('No token available');}const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/save-predictions/").concat(eventId,"/"),{predictions},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token),'Content-Type':'application/json'}});return response.data;};return{savePredictions};};export default useEventPredictionService;
